decision_1.title: Lean as Formal Verification Language

philosophical_foundations.sovereignty_principle: We define our own axioms. The system validates what we declare at its boundaries.
philosophical_foundations.rigidity_vs_fluidity: YouTube (creation) requires GitHub (validation). Neither alone is sufficient.
philosophical_foundations.zero_over_zero: Indeterminate forms reveal truth at boundaries where traditional logic dissolves.
philosophical_foundations.exponential_imperative: Linear thinking yields linear results. Exponential systems require exponential architecture.
philosophical_foundations.temporal_intentionality: Duration is not random. Every second is deliberate. Time is architecture.
